resources.string:
Mafia Rules:
1. This app can serve 3-8 players.
2. The players in the game will be split up into two groups, the Mafia and citizens. The Mafia will try to eliminate the citizens until the number of citizens equals one. The Mafia choose who to eliminate during the "Evening" phase.
3. The citizens will vote on a person to "exile" during the "Day" phase, with a majority vote needed. The Mafia gets to vote with the citizens. The citizens win when the Mafia is found out and eliminated.
 4. Special Roles, the citizens have two speciala members, the Detective and the Nurse. The Detective Have Fun!
